setup: CREATE TABLE patient (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100),gender varchar(10), dob date, aadhar_no VARCHAR(12), address VARCHAR(100), district VARCHAR(30));

query: SELECT name, gender, district FROM patient;
